text: Limit is an inverted roller coaster at Heide-Park Soltau, Germany. It is a standard Suspended Looping Coaster built by Dutch roller coaster builder Vekoma and opened in 1999. Limit has 5 inversions, has a length of 689 meter, a maximum speed of 80 kilometers per hour. One round takes 1 minute and 36 seconds. Limit has 2 trains with each 10 cars. 1 car can hold 2 riders, which gives a total of 20 riders per train. The maximum capacity is 1040 riders per hour. == References == Category:Buildings and structures in Lower Saxony Category:Roller coasters by name Category:Roller coasters in Germany Category:Steel roller coasters
title: Limit (roller coaster)
